title: Hi, I’m Janette Limon
text: Hi, I’m Janette Limon. I am a bilingual digital marketing professional with a passion for driving community impact through storytelling, data, and strategy. With experience spanning nonprofit outreach, government communications, and brand development, I specialize in connecting audiences with meaningful messages that move them to action.

title: Hi, I’m Janette Limon
text:
Personal Statement
I believe that marketing is more than a campaign—it’s a vehicle for change. Whether it’s a health equity initiative, a conference that sparks collaboration, or a youth-focused awareness campaign, I’m driven by the power of strategy and data to uplift underserved voices and shape better futures. My goal is to merge creativity and analytics to build campaigns that not only perform—but make a difference.

title: Hi, I’m Janette Limon
text:
Let’s Connect
You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

Welcome to my portfolio.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected projects that highlight my experience applying marketing analytics, strategy, and digital tools to real-world and academic challenges. These projects reflect my ability to blend data insights, community-focused storytelling, and creative execution to support outreach, engagement, and growth.
Whether developing digital campaigns, analyzing customer data, or proposing strategic initiatives, I approach each project with a balance of research, empathy, and results-driven thinking.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Event Campaign Performance: Strategic promotion and outreach for events like the National Innovative Communities Conference, Health Professions Conference, and Día de los Muertos in Jurupa Valley.
School-Based Analytics Projects: Marketing and data analysis initiatives completed at Cal Poly Pomona—including CRM proposals, digital platform research, and brand strategy.
Digital Content Testing Building and optimizing social media campaigns tailored to generate leads, increase registration, or raise community awareness
Website Creation & UX Design: Designing a branded cupcake e-commerce website from scratch using WordPress and Weebly.
Student Engagement Research: Academic insights into how platforms like Instagram and Discord shape the student experience through statistical analysis.

title: Summary
text: Bilingual digital marketing professional with a strong foundation in media coordination, nonprofit communications, and data-driven outreach. Skilled in managing cross-functional marketing campaigns and creating impactful bilingual content for diverse audiences.

title: Summary
text:
Media & Marketing Coordinator, Reach Out
Jul 2024 – Present
- Lead digital campaigns for health equity, youth engagement, and community events
- Manage brand alignment across departments and design all outreach materials
- Promote major conferences like NICC and Día de los Muertos

title: Some stuff about me
text:
Some stuff about me

I poisoned myself doing research.
I was the first woman to win a Nobel prize
I was the first person and only woman to win a Nobel prize in two different sciences.
